post.body: finding information there in the beginning. I don't know what it was or is. The forums are so helpful in that respect.
no problem. It took me forever to figure out Etsy. There is something intrinsically wrong with it, in that I had a hard time
I know its cold for you folks. This is early fall for me. I *love* it.
This isn't cold :P
Now *that* is an awesome gift. Lucky little girl:)
right no one pays. The gift guides are sheer luck as well. The showcases are the ones that you pay for.
@RegalBeads thank you! I am so thrilled:)
thanks! I missed it, but that's okay.
www.lessfriends.com
yup...tht avatar is my cat. He loves my husband.
RT@thebadcat got on http://openzap.com saying: I'm in this one too! Check out the soap I want to eat: http://tinyurl.com/6o45uq
is that something I need to register for? I seem to be joining a lot of stuff since finding Twitter.
that was pretty cool to look. Neat finds.
@Hedgewytch @craftblog Thanks peeps. I knew I could count on my tweeples:)
I love Paris too! Such a lovely old city. Enjoy your holiday there.
Yup! That is why I like it.
RT YOU have been Clipped http://tinyurl.com/7luyu7 & Stumbled http://tinyurl.com/6eguar *meow-hissss* You ROCK!
Its prettier than Etsy:) I like the listing system and the search. I also like that I don't pay .20 up front.
San Antonio. I haven't found decent bagels.
Thank you!! www.badcatjewelry.1000markets.com You rock!
I saw that! Thanks! I sent you an email via their system.
thanks! It was so much quicker than I anticipated.
off to work on bracelet, will post pictures at somepoint.
I smell purty, cuz of this: http://tinyurl.com/5ra5eq Holy yummarama...delish...so good. me likey.
Just got back from Hobby Lobby. Huge sale on everything it seems. Plus with a 40% off coupon I got some glitter markers for kiddos stocking
Off to run some errands including dropping off an order at the PO. Someone bought a necklace last night:) Yay! Postive Paypal balance:)
I made the front page this morning: http://tinyurl.com/6nvxr8 so excited!!
Morning all. apparently I was tired and turned off the monitor.
Night all! No, I'm not having a sale: www.badcatjewelry.etsy.com or www.badcatjewelry.artfire.com
OK...how long has the FP on Etsy been up? CHANGE IT!
http://tinyurl.com/6cgugf
http://tinyurl.com/73gsse I'm starting early:)
I'm knackered. Going to bed.
Thanks for looking people! I need to go to bed. Its around 2 am!
http://tinyurl.com/94lsbn How sad, this bracelet barely has any views.
Just had a sale yay! To a repeat customer. I love it when that happens.
I need a nap. Honestly. I do.
It is so easy to list there!
I am still working on my store: www.badcatjewelry.1000markets.com
